doc.field: Tax parcel index: City of Alexandria GIS (Datastack) Datasets

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab by the City of Alexandria’s GIS Division. Alexandria, Virginia’s GIS Division is a branch of the Department of Planning and Zoning, which is responsible for data maintenance and coordination. These data pertain primarily to the infrastructure and land use within the City of Alexandria as well as related natural features. The datastack primarily dates back to 2004, but some data from the 2000 Census are also included. Data are provided AS-IS with no guarantee of their completeness, accuracy or content. * // * ISO Thematic Topics Categories include: boundaries, elevation, environment, location, planning Cadastre, society, structure, and transportation. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included attributes): * Address points, incl: full address and street name * Alexandria city limits – polyline * Alexandria city limits – polygon * Recreational amenities, incl: amenity type (e.g., athletic field, play ground, swimming pool, etc.) * Bike paths, incl: path type (on or off street) * Building footprints with elevation data * Building footprints – polygon * Contour lines at 2 ft. intervals * Driveways – polygon, incl: description (paved or unpaved) * Enterprise zone – economic development area * Virginia House of Representatives districts (boundaries), incl: district # * Hydrology – incl: all lakes, canal and rivers >5 ft, feature type (e.g. lake, canal), name * Metro lines in Alexandria, incl: line name, above or below ground data * Metro stops in Alexandria, incl: station name * Tax parcel index – tax parcel map sheets * Tax parcels – polygon, incl: owner name and address, sale data, sale amount, census tract #, property name, legal description * Parking lots and off-street parking – polygon, incl: lot description * City-owned parks, incl: park name * Piers * Polling places, incl: precinct name and address * Voting precincts, incl: precinct name and number * Rail lines * Recreation centers – point features, incl: center name * Metro/DC region boundaries, incl: area names * Road centerlines, incl. street names, description * Road edges, e.g. curbs, curb cuts and alleys, incl: description * Streets, incl: paved and unpaved roads, alleys, medians and shoulders * Alexandria public school board boundaries * City of Alexandria public schools, incl: school name * VA Senate districts * Shoreline along eastern portion of city * Small area planning, incl: area name * Stream and river centerlines * Precise zip code boundaries * Walkways (sidewalks, crosswalks and stairs) * Generalized zip code boundaries – polygon * Zoning districts in Alexandria, incl: zoning data (coded) * 2000 Census block groups – polygon, incl: demographic and population data * 2000 Census blocks, incl: population and demographic data * 2000 Census tracks, incl: population and demographic data
* // * More detailed descriptions of the datasets and coding schemes can be found on the City of Alexandria’s GIS page (URL: http://www3.alexandriava.gov/city/planning_zoning/gis/gis_data.html). * // * These data were made available to the University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
